member.name: T:UBHelper.Jumper
member.summary: Helper class to assist with jumping

member.name: M:UBHelper.Jumper.Jump(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tells your character to jump.
member.param: how much power to put into the jump, between 0-1
set to true to perform a "walk" jump
set to true to hold the move forward button while jumping
set to true to hold the move backward button while jumping
set to true to hold the left strafe button while jumping
set to true to hold the right strafe button while jumping

member.name: M:UBHelper.Jumper.JumpCancel
member.summary: Cancel the current jump attempt

member.name: E:UBHelper.Jumper.JumpComplete
member.summary: Raised when the jump has been completed, and you hit the ground.

member.summary: Crams all backpack items into sidepacks

member.summary: Stacks all items in your backpack and sidepacks into as few stacks as possible

member.summary: Unstacks splitItem or the currently selected item in your inventory if splitItem is 0

member.name: T:UBHelper.Fellow
member.summary: Helper methods for managing a ac fellowship

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.InFellowship
member.summary: Returns true if the the player is in a fellowship

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of the current fellowship

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.Leader
member.summary: get: Returns true if the current fellowship leader's character id set: Give the leader position of the current fellowship to character_id. This only works if you are the fellowship leader.
member.param: the id of the character to give the leadership position to

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.IsLeader
member.summary: Returns true if the player is the leader of the current fellowship

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.MemberCount
member.summary: Returns the number of players in the current fellowship (very cheap)

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.Members
member.summary: Returns a list of players in the current fellowship (very expensive)

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.ShareXP
member.summary: Returns true if the current fellowship is sharing xp

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.EvenXPSplit
member.summary: Returns true if the current fellowship is evenly splitting xp

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.Open
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current fellowship Openess. Set only works if you are the fellowship leader.

member.name: P:UBHelper.Fellow.Locked
member.summary: Returns true if the current fellowship is Locked.

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Create an ac fellowship

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.Quit
member.summary: Quit the current ac fellowship

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.IsInFellowship(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the character is in your fellowship

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.Disband
member.summary: Disband the current ac fellowship

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.Dismiss(System.Int32)
member.summary: Dismiss a character from the fellowship. Only works if you are the fellowship leader.

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.Recruit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Recruit a character into the current ac fellowship. The fellowship must be open, or you must be the leader.

member.name: M:UBHelper.Fellow.Update(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Request a fellowship update from the server
member.param: Set to true to get full data (player vitals)

member.name: T:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest
member.summary: Helper class for working with confirmation requests. These are the ingame popups that require a user to click yes/no for example.

member.name: E:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest.ConfirmationRequestEvent
member.summary: Raised when a confirmation request (yes/no popup) is wanting to be shown on the client

member.name: T:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest.ConfirmationRequestEventArgs
member.summary: Holds information about a confirmation request. Setting either ClickYes or ClickNo to true will skip showing the dialog to the user, and perform that action. If both ClickYes and ClickNo are set to the default values of false, nothing will happen and the confirmation request will be shown to the user as normal.

member.name: P:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest.ConfirmationRequestEventArgs.Confirm
member.summary: The type of confirmation request.

member.name: P:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest.ConfirmationRequestEventArgs.Text
member.summary: The text that would be shown to the user

member.name: P:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest.ConfirmationRequestEventArgs.ClickYes
member.summary: Set to true to automatically click yes before the popup is shown to the user

member.name: P:UBHelper.ConfirmationRequest.ConfirmationRequestEventArgs.ClickNo
member.summary: Set to true to automatically click no before the popup is shown to the user.
